---


library(tidyverse)
library("ggplot2")
install.packages("readr")
library(readr)
data <- read_delim("330.csv")
data <- read.csv("330.csv")

data %>% 
filter(Expense=="Room/Board"|Expense=="Fees/Tuition") %>% 
group_by(Expense,State) %>% 
summarise(ave=mean(Value),.groups="keep") %>% 
ggplot( aes(State,ave,fill=as.factor(Expense))) +
geom_col(position="dodge")+
labs(title="how much on average families are spending on fees/tuition and on room/board per state",x="Expense Type",y="Tuition Cost")+
scale_fill_discrete(name="Expense Type")
